name: Raspberry Juice
description:
Welcome to "Raspberry juice" Forest Adventure! 

The challenge is to help the bear meet his shy bunny friend who's hiding behind his home. The path to the bunny's home is filled with trees that you need to hide behind to avoid getting caught.

Are you ready to accept the challenge and use your skills to find the right trees and reach the bunny's home? Then let's get started and help the bear meet his bunny friend!
